metadata.name: Holi Run
metadata.description: “The Color Race” or “The Holi Run” is an individual non-competitive race of colors that gathers a lot of people to run the happiest and funniest 5 kilometers on earth. Each kilometer is represented by a color. The runners receive color bombs that mark the kilometer they are running. In this way, at the end of the race, the participants are covered by all colors (one color for each kilometer), and that means they have run through all the kilometers.
